predictedIssues.issue: External library compatibility issues with the new environment
predictedIssues.mitigation: Ensure the external auth library is compatible with the target environment or find alternatives.

predictedIssues.issue: Context and hooks not properly initialized after migration
predictedIssues.mitigation: Review and adjust the initialization of React context and hooks in the migrated UI components.

predictedIssues.issue: Failing tests due to changes in auth library behavior
predictedIssues.mitigation: Update tests to reflect the new auth library behavior or configuration.

predictedIssues.issue: Type errors due to discrepancies between the types used in the external auth library and the application
predictedIssues.mitigation: Adjust type definitions to match the external library's types or extend them to fit the application's needs.

predictedIssues.issue: Build failures due to unresolved imports from the auth library
predictedIssues.mitigation: Check and correct import paths for the external auth library; ensure all dependencies are correctly installed.

predictedIssues.issue: Missing exports of newly created utility functions or components
predictedIssues.mitigation: Review and ensure all new utilities or components are correctly exported and imported.

predictedIssues.issue: Circular dependencies introduced during the migration of business logic
predictedIssues.mitigation: Refactor the code to eliminate circular dependencies, possibly by reorganizing the business logic or splitting into smaller modules.
